6aec4580d443.bio: Contributor: SBNation, Fansided, RotoBaller, Fantistics. Author of up-coming book: Starting IX: A Franchise-by-Franchise Breakdown of Baseball’s Best Players.
6aec4580d443.name: Jim Turvey

7973075212bc.bio: Top Medium writer in sports, TV, humor, NFL, NBA. Words at Cauldron, 16 Wins Ring, Sports Pickle, Bleacher Report, Hoop NBA, and others @wheatonbrando
7973075212bc.name: Brandon Anderson

fadf04379909.title: Haley, I’m glad you picked Harden’s game as the best this season.

paragraphs.name: 95d5
paragraphs.text: Haley, I’m glad you picked Harden’s game as the best this season. It would be very tempting to select Russ’s crazy game last week. To me, Harden’s big game is just as impressive as Kobe’s 81. If you think about it, he was responsible for more points than Kobe was in that game. Legendary.

5f1e7f6f253e.title: Glad this was spread around. This could have easily been 5 Harden games, 5 Westbrook games.

paragraphs.text: Glad this was spread around. This could have easily been 5 Harden games, 5 Westbrook games.

7df1402e94c6.title: How about Nurkic’s 28/20/8/6 against Philly, which as far back as BR’s Game Finder has box scores…

paragraphs.name: 251b
paragraphs.text: How about Nurkic’s 28/20/8/6 against Philly, which as far back as BR’s Game Finder has box scores has only been matched once, by Barkley in ‘86? Even if you relax it to 25/20/5/5 it’s just Garnett (2x) Shaq (1x) Robinson (2x) Hakeem (4x) and Barkley (1x), which is pretty heady company for Nurk.

d5b614f46efe.title: The difference between Booker at #7 and Butler at #2 is that Booker had 18 more points and Butler…

paragraphs.name: 46dc
paragraphs.text: The difference between Booker at #7 and Butler at #2 is that Booker had 18 more points and Butler had 4 more rebounds. I am not saying Booker should be #1, but he should be above Butler, IMO.

d8fd770a99f5.title: Sort of a silly exercise when we only include 1 game from Russ and Harden, right?

paragraphs.name: cccd
paragraphs.text:
The Absurdity of Triple-Doubles and the Incredible 2017 NBA Season
What happens when five or ten NBA players all have historic seasons at once?

paragraphs.name: dac0
paragraphs.text: Sort of a silly exercise when we only include 1 game from Russ and Harden, right? They each had 20+ games this season better than Booker’s.

a85ae76dc53e.title: Steph Curry (13–17 from 3 point range on his way to 46 points along with 5 rebounds 5 assists and 2…

paragraphs.text: Steph Curry (13–17 from 3 point range on his way to 46 points along with 5 rebounds 5 assists and 2 steals in 35 minutes, one night after going 0–10 from 3 point range) would like a word.

934fb8a085cc.title: Seconded Draymond’s Feb 10 game against Memphis.

paragraphs.name: 8f62
paragraphs.text: Seconded Draymond’s Feb 10 game against Memphis. Not only did he get a triple double without the points, he missed a 5x5…because of points.
